subject: Wages and Salaries
Football
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. teams will have nearly $12 million more under the salary cap this season, the final year with one in place unless the league and its players union can reach a new collective bargaining agreement.
snippet: N.F.L. teams will have nearly $12 million more under the salary cap this season, the final year with one in place unless the league and its players union can reach a new collective bargaining agreement.
